content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am glad to hear that you are interested in renting it. The apartment is 25 square meters, and I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible price. What is your starting price?

I am Max Müller from Germany. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible. Let me know if there is anything else I can provide you with.

I am willing to negotiate the rental price. What is your starting price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for your interest in the apartment. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains, so I do not have a starting price. However, I am willing to negotiate on the rental price based on your qualifications as a responsible and dependable tenant. Can you provide me with more information about your financial situation and how long you plan to stay in the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I will be staying in the apartment for a year. I have a monthly income of 1,500 Euros. I am willing to pay a reasonable rental price that is fair for both parties.

I am Max Müller from Germany. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible. Let me know if there is anything else I can provide you with.

I am willing to negotiate the rental price. What is your starting price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for your response. Based on your qualifications as a responsible and dependable tenant, I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. My starting price for the apartment is 1,000 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing a lower rental price if you can provide evidence of your financial stability and ability to pay the rent on time. Can you provide me with your bank statement or any other financial documents that can support your claims?
name: Heinrich Heine
